main event: An unidentified flying object with green and red flashing lights was observed in Kirksville, Missouri, on May 15, 1967.
interesting points: The object was first seen at about 6,000 feet and traveling at approximately 225 mph before climbing steeply into the clouds., Witnesses described the object's lights as appearing to be rotating., The observer was a 74-year-old female with a reliable reputation., The object emitted no sound while it was visible., Two additional witnesses, a doctor and a nurse, also reported seeing the object.
sighted object: a round object with green and red flashing lights
witness description: 74-year-old female, a doctor, and a nurse
